set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
aux_source_directory(dex dex_src)
aux_source_directory(./ build_src)
include_directories(./../)
if (shared_library)
    add_library(dex SHARED ${dex_src} ${build_src})
    target_link_libraries(dex base)
else ()
    add_library(dex STATIC ${dex_src} ${build_src} )
endif ()
